intro_questions.text: Can you spell your family name, please?

main_questions.text: Can you play sports at school?
What is your favorite childhood game?
What is your favorite thing to do in summer?

respond_situations.description: You see a shirt in a shop and want to know the price.

respond_situations.starter_line: Do you want to play outside?
respond_situations.description: You are talking to a friend.

respond_situations.starter_line: What would you like to drink?
What do you want to drink?
respond_situations.description: You are at a café. You need to order a drink.

ask_situations.instruction: You are at school. Ask your friend for help with homework.
You are at a park. You want to ask someone to take a photo. ..
You are shopping. Ask the shopkeeper for the price of an item.

listening_script.text: I read a book every day. Books are fun. I like stories. They take me to new places. I read at home.

follow_up_questions.question: What did you eat for dinner?
When do you usually have dinner?
